summary.auth_sign_up: registration, after which an email with a code will be sent
summary.auth_confirm: to confirm the user, you need to enter the code from the mail
summary.auth_new_code: allows you to request a new code

examples.incorrect_code_convert: Confirmation code was not converted correctly

descriptions.user_logged_in_and_tokens_generated: The user logged in and tokens were generated.
descriptions.user_add_database_and_return_code_expire: User has been add to database and return code expired time.
descriptions.user_not_add_database_or_body_throw_exce: User not added to database or body validation throw exception.
descriptions.incorrect_data_or_body_throw_exception: Incorrect data or body validation throw exception.
descriptions.tokens_not_created_or_body_throw_excepti: Tokens could not be created or body validation throw exception.
descriptions.user_not_found_password_not_match_users_: User was not found in the system, the passwords do not match or user's email is not confirmed.
descriptions.code_expired_code_doesnt_match_the_one_s: Code expired, code doesn't match the one sent by email or user by email not found.
descriptions.code_send_to_email: Code will be send to email.
descriptions.user_not_found_by_email: User not found in database by email.
descriptions.previous_code_still_exist_user_already_c: The previous code still exists in redis, the user is already confirmed or body validation throw exception.
